sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; class EditUser extends Component { constructor() { super() this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { dob: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", type: "".toUpperCase(), success: "", states: [], userList: [], sideBarUserList: [] } } render() { return (
this.setEmail(e.target.value)} type="email" name="email" className="form-control w-100" id="email" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="Enter email" required /> We'll never share your email with anyone else.
this.setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" name="password" className="form-control w-100" id="password" placeholder="Password" required /> We'll never share your email with anyone else.
this.setFirstName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="firstName" className="form-control w-100" id="firstName" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="First Name" />
this.setLastName(e.target.value)} type="text" name="lastName" className="form-control w-100" id="lastName" placeholder="Last Name" />
this.setAddress(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress" name="address" placeholder="1234 Main St" />
this.setUnit(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="unit" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.setDob(e.target.value)} type="date" className="form-control" id="inputAddress2" name="unit" placeholder="Apartment, studio, or floor" />
this.setCity(e.target.value)} type="text" className="form-control" name="city" id="inputCity" />
this.setZipcode(e.target.value)} type="text" name="zipcode" className="form-control" id="inputZip" />

{this.state.message}

); } } export default EditUser;
